title: GPU machines can be in a bad state

content.raw:
Sometimes, it seems that a GPU-equipped machine boots up in a bad state, wherein GL applications run badly or not at all.  Symptoms include:

 * glxgears returns wildly varying frame rates
 * gzserver never completes its setup, getting stuck in the first call that it makes to GL

Rebooting the machine seems to fix it.

I'm attaching a tarball of /var/log from a machine that was in the bad state then was rebooted into the good state (the logs were grabbed when in the good state).  We should do the same (get logs) for a machine in the bad state.
